Name: Astral Resurgence
Story Background: When all seemed lost, the planeswalker transcended mortal limitations, weaving the very fabric of the cosmos to herald a resurgence of hope and renewal.
Ability: Return all creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. They gain lifelink until end of turn.
Appearance Description: A planeswalker surrounded by a luminous astral glow, as ethereal souls soar from the beyond, coalescing into the material realm to join the fray once more. The artwork shimmers with transcendent whites and radiant blues, evoking a sense of cosmic resurgence and otherworldly intervention.
